div.span: Parents and Students: beginning Monday, April 13 all Barberton City Schools courses will be taught through remote learning. Please contact teachers directly if you have questions about the remote learning platform.
All staff emails can be searched through students gmail account or through the staff directory.
The links below will take you to assignments for Monday, March 16 - Friday, April 3.
